00070 static DdNode * addMMRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *A, DdNode *B, int topP, int *vars));
00071 static DdNode * addTriangleRecur ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, DdNode *g, int *vars));

00099 DdNode *
00100 Cudd_addMatrixMultiply(
00101   DdManager * dd,
00102   DdNode * A,
00103   DdNode * B,
00104   DdNode ** z,
00105   int  nz)
00106 {
00107     int i, nvars, *vars;
00108     DdNode *res; 
00109 
00110     /* Array vars says what variables are "summation" variables. */
00111     nvars = dd->size;
00112     vars = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00113     if (vars == NULL) {
00114         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00115         return(NULL);
00116     }
00117     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00118         vars[i] = 0;
00119     }
00120     for (i = 0; i < nz; i++) {
00121         vars[z[i]->index] = 1;
00122     }
00123 
00124     do {
00125         dd->reordered = 0;
00126         res = addMMRecur(dd,A,B,-1,vars);
00127     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00128     FREE(vars);
00129     return(res);
00130 
00131 } /* end of Cudd_addMatrixMultiply */

00152 DdNode *
00153 Cudd_addTimesPlus(
00154   DdManager * dd,
00155   DdNode * A,
00156   DdNode * B,
00157   DdNode ** z,
00158   int  nz)
00159 {
00160     DdNode *w, *cube, *tmp, *res; 
00161     int i;
00162     tmp = Cudd_addApply(dd,Cudd_addTimes,A,B);
00163     if (tmp == NULL) return(NULL);
00164     Cudd_Ref(tmp);
00165     Cudd_Ref(cube = DD_ONE(dd));
00166     for (i = nz-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00167          w = Cudd_addIte(dd,z[i],cube,DD_ZERO(dd));
00168          if (w == NULL) {
00169             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,tmp);
00170             return(NULL);
00171          }
00172          Cudd_Ref(w);
00173          Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00174          cube = w;
00175     }
00176     res = Cudd_addExistAbstract(dd,tmp,cube);
00177     if (res == NULL) {
00178         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,tmp);
00179         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00180         return(NULL);
00181     }
00182     Cudd_Ref(res);
00183     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,cube);
00184     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,tmp);
00185     Cudd_Deref(res);
00186     return(res);
00187 
00188 } /* end of Cudd_addTimesPlus */

00210 DdNode *
00211 Cudd_addTriangle(
00212   DdManager * dd,
00213   DdNode * f,
00214   DdNode * g,
00215   DdNode ** z,
00216   int  nz)
00217 {
00218     int    i, nvars, *vars;
00219     DdNode *res;
00220 
00221     nvars = dd->size;
00222     vars = ALLOC(int, nvars);
00223     if (vars == NULL) {
00224         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00225         return(NULL);
00226     }
00227     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) vars[i] = -1;
00228     for (i = 0; i < nz; i++) vars[z[i]->index] = i;
00229 
00230     do {
00231         dd->reordered = 0;
00232         res = addTriangleRecur(dd, f, g, vars);
00233     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00234     FREE(vars);
00235     return(res);
00236 
00237 } /* end of Cudd_addTriangle */

00259 static DdNode *
00260 addMMRecur(
00261   DdManager * dd,
00262   DdNode * A,
00263   DdNode * B,
00264   int  topP,
00265   int * vars)
00266 {
00267     DdNode *zero,
00268            *At,         /* positive cofactor of first operand */
00269            *Ae,         /* negative cofactor of first operand */
00270            *Bt,         /* positive cofactor of second operand */
00271            *Be,         /* negative cofactor of second operand */
00272            *t,          /* positive cofactor of result */
00273            *e,          /* negative cofactor of result */
00274            *scaled,     /* scaled result */
00275            *add_scale,  /* ADD representing the scaling factor */
00276            *res;
00277     int i;              /* loop index */
00278     int scale;          /* scaling factor */
00279     int index;          /* index of the top variable */
00280     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00281     unsigned int topA, topB, topV;
00282     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00283 
00284     zero = DD_ZERO(dd);
00285 
00286     if (A == zero || B == zero) {
00287         return(zero);
00288     }
00289 
00290     if (cuddIsConstant(A) && cuddIsConstant(B)) {
00291         /* Compute the scaling factor. It is 2^k, where k is the
00292         ** number of summation variables below the current variable.
00293         ** Indeed, these constants represent blocks of 2^k identical
00294         ** constant values in both A and B.
00295         */
00296         scale = 1;
00297         for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) {
00298             if (vars[i]) {
00299                 if (dd->perm[i] > topP) {
00300                     scale <<= 1;
00301                 }
00302             }
00303         }
00304         value = cuddV(A) * cuddV(B) * (CUDD_VALUE_TYPE) scale;
00305         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd, value);
00306         return(res);
00307     }
00308 
00309     /* Standardize to increase cache efficiency. Clearly, A*B != B*A
00310     ** in matrix multiplication. However, which matrix is which is
00311     ** determined by the variables appearing in the ADDs and not by
00312     ** which one is paased as first argument.
00313     */
00314     if (A > B) {
00315         DdNode *tmp = A;
00316         A = B;
00317         B = tmp;
00318     }
00319 
00320     topA = cuddI(dd,A->index); topB = cuddI(dd,B->index);
00321     topV = ddMin(topA,topB);
00322 
00323     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *)) addMMRecur;
00324     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,cacheOp,A,B);
00325     if (res != NULL) {
00326         /* If the result is 0, there is no need to normalize.
00327         ** Otherwise we count the number of z variables between
00328         ** the current depth and the top of the ADDs. These are
00329         ** the missing variables that determine the size of the
00330         ** constant blocks.
00331         */
00332         if (res == zero) return(res);
00333         scale = 1;
00334         for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) {
00335             if (vars[i]) {
00336                 if (dd->perm[i] > topP && (unsigned) dd->perm[i] < topV) {
00337                     scale <<= 1;
00338                 }
00339             }
00340         }
00341         if (scale > 1) {
00342             cuddRef(res);
00343             add_scale = cuddUniqueConst(dd,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE)scale);
00344             if (add_scale == NULL) {
00345                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00346                 return(NULL);
00347             }
00348             cuddRef(add_scale);
00349             scaled = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,Cudd_addTimes,res,add_scale);
00350             if (scaled == NULL) {
00351                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, add_scale);
00352                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00353                 return(NULL);
00354             }
00355             cuddRef(scaled);
00356             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, add_scale);
00357             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00358             res = scaled;
00359             cuddDeref(res);
00360         }
00361         return(res);
00362     }
00363 
00364     /* compute the cofactors */
00365     if (topV == topA) {
00366         At = cuddT(A);
00367         Ae = cuddE(A);
00368     } else {
00369         At = Ae = A;
00370     }
00371     if (topV == topB) {
00372         Bt = cuddT(B);
00373         Be = cuddE(B);
00374     } else {
00375         Bt = Be = B;
00376     }
00377 
00378     t = addMMRecur(dd, At, Bt, (int)topV, vars);
00379     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00380     cuddRef(t);
00381     e = addMMRecur(dd, Ae, Be, (int)topV, vars);
00382     if (e == NULL) {
00383         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00384         return(NULL);
00385     }
00386     cuddRef(e);
00387 
00388     index = dd->invperm[topV];
00389     if (vars[index] == 0) {
00390         /* We have split on either the rows of A or the columns
00391         ** of B. We just need to connect the two subresults,
00392         ** which correspond to two submatrices of the result.
00393         */
00394         res = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,t,e);
00395         if (res == NULL) {
00396             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00397             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00398             return(NULL);
00399         }
00400         cuddRef(res);
00401         cuddDeref(t);
00402         cuddDeref(e);
00403     } else {
00404         /* we have simultaneously split on the columns of A and
00405         ** the rows of B. The two subresults must be added.
00406         */
00407         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,Cudd_addPlus,t,e);
00408         if (res == NULL) {
00409             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00410             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00411             return(NULL);
00412         }
00413         cuddRef(res);
00414         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00415         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00416     }
00417 
00418     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,cacheOp,A,B,res);
00419 
00420     /* We have computed (and stored in the computed table) a minimal
00421     ** result; that is, a result that assumes no summation variables
00422     ** between the current depth of the recursion and its top
00423     ** variable. We now take into account the z variables by properly
00424     ** scaling the result.
00425     */
00426     if (res != zero) {
00427         scale = 1;
00428         for (i = 0; i < dd->size; i++) {
00429             if (vars[i]) {
00430                 if (dd->perm[i] > topP && (unsigned) dd->perm[i] < topV) {
00431                     scale <<= 1;
00432                 }
00433             }
00434         }
00435         if (scale > 1) {
00436             add_scale = cuddUniqueConst(dd,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE)scale);
00437             if (add_scale == NULL) {
00438                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00439                 return(NULL);
00440             }
00441             cuddRef(add_scale);
00442             scaled = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,Cudd_addTimes,res,add_scale);
00443             if (scaled == NULL) {
00444                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00445                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, add_scale);
00446                 return(NULL);
00447             }
00448             cuddRef(scaled);
00449             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, add_scale);
00450             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00451             res = scaled;
00452         }
00453     }
00454     cuddDeref(res);
00455     return(res);
00456 
00457 } /* end of addMMRecur */
00458 
00459 
00470 static DdNode *
00471 addTriangleRecur(
00472   DdManager * dd,
00473   DdNode * f,
00474   DdNode * g,
00475   int * vars)
00476 {
00477     DdNode *fv, *fvn, *gv, *gvn, *t, *e, *res;
00478     CUDD_VALUE_TYPE value;
00479     int top, topf, topg, index;
00480     DdNode *(*cacheOp)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *);
00481 
00482     if (f == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd) || g == DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd)) {
00483         return(DD_PLUS_INFINITY(dd));
00484     }
00485 
00486     if (cuddIsConstant(f) && cuddIsConstant(g)) {
00487         value = cuddV(f) + cuddV(g);
00488         res = cuddUniqueConst(dd, value);
00489         return(res);
00490     }
00491     if (f < g) {
00492         DdNode *tmp = f;
00493         f = g;
00494         g = tmp;
00495     }
00496     cacheOp = (DdNode *(*)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *)) addTriangleRecur;
00497     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,cacheOp,f,g);
00498     if (res != NULL) {
00499         return(res);
00500     }
00501 
00502     topf = cuddI(dd,f->index); topg = cuddI(dd,g->index);
00503     top = ddMin(topf,topg);
00504 
00505     if (top == topf) {fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);} else {fv = fvn = f;}
00506     if (top == topg) {gv = cuddT(g); gvn = cuddE(g);} else {gv = gvn = g;}
00507 
00508     t = addTriangleRecur(dd, fv, gv, vars);
00509     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00510     cuddRef(t);
00511     e = addTriangleRecur(dd, fvn, gvn, vars);
00512     if (e == NULL) {
00513         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00514         return(NULL);
00515     }
00516     cuddRef(e);
00517 
00518     index = dd->invperm[top];
00519     if (vars[index] < 0) {
00520         res = (t == e) ? t : cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,t,e);
00521         if (res == NULL) {
00522             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00523             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00524             return(NULL);
00525         }
00526         cuddDeref(t);
00527         cuddDeref(e);
00528     } else {
00529         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(dd,Cudd_addMinimum,t,e);
00530         if (res == NULL) {
00531             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00532             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00533             return(NULL);
00534         }
00535         cuddRef(res);
00536         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t);
00537         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, e);
00538         cuddDeref(res);
00539     }
00540 
00541     cuddCacheInsert2(dd, cacheOp, f, g, res);
00542 
00543     return(res);
00544 
00545 } /* end of addTriangleRecur */
